title: Two conferences between some of those that are called Separatists & Independents, concerning their different tenents one whereof, was appointed with Mr. Burton and a number of his church, and the other with Mr. John Goodwin and some of his church ... / now published by D.B. ...
author: Brown, David, fl. 1650-1652.
notes: "To the impartial reader" signed: David Brown.
"Mr. Chidley's letter to Mr. Goodwin": p. 9.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
